description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2018/2316/P dated 20/10/2020 for: "Erection of a 7 storey building plus basement for student accommodation use with rooms of accommodation on the upper floors and shared amenity space at ground and sixth floor levels and terrace at 6th floor level fronting Stephenson Way (Sui Generis), plus retention of the vehicular easement from Stephenson Way to the rear of 222 Euston Road" approved; namely:  enlargement of basement to allow plant room underneath approved car ramp; and northern retaining wall of basement to step inwards by 250mm.
site_name: Land fronting Stephenson Way (to the rear of 222 Euston Road adjacent to 210 Euston Road)
